attributes.action: give more support in the form of time, money and awareness to WaterAid for developing countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Clean water is essential for life, but one in eight people do not have it. 1.4 million children die each year due to contaminated water. This is approximately 4000 per day and 1 every 20 seconds.
In Britain we are privilaged enough that we never have to worry that our water will kill us so we take it for granted. If this petition is successful and recieves enough support from the public, the government will have to do something about it. By just signing your name, you can help to save the lives of those less fortunate than yourself.
www.WaterAid.org
